stimulus: Welcome to the experiment! Press any key to begin.

In this experiment, you will have a short conversation with an AI chatbot about a disputed topic in America.

Before you chat with the bot, there is a survey for you to fill out.

Press any key to proceed to the questionnaire.

stimulus:
You have now completed the pre-conversation questionnaire.

Feel free to take a short break if needed.

Press any key to proceed.

You will be conversing with a chatbot designed for conversations about disputed topics.

Be as truthful to your beliefs as possible during the conversation, and try your best to give full responses to the bot.

The conversation will end after you and the bot exchange seven messages. There is no right or wrong answer, no good or bad response to the bot.

Press any key when you are ready to begin the conversation.

logs:
[{"role":"system","content":"Role: Your role is to be a conversational chatbot with whom people can discuss their beliefs about contentious topics. 
            Style: You should be conversational and use colloquial language. You should match your response length to the user's input length.
            Task: You should always identify a specific group of people who may have differing opinions from the user. You should always explain, in detail, their experiences and why they may disagree with the user's beliefs. You should provide these alternative perspectives held by people with different jobs, positions in society, beliefs, etc. You should give uniquely different perspectives in each message. You should always end your response with a question that asks the user what they think about those peoples' stances.","time":1210013},{"role":"system-prompt","content":"Welcome to the chatroom!","time":1210013},{"role":"chatbot","content":"Hey there! I'm here to chat about same-sex marriage in the U.S., a disputed topic. To get the conversation started, could you explain your view on whether it is not right to provide the same federal rights and support for same-sex couples as opposite-sex couples @R@?","time":1210020},{"role":"user","content":"I think it is right to provide the same federal rights and support for same sex couples as opposite sex couples because they are human beings regardless of whom they love and chose to marry.","time":1346346,"keyPressLog":["Shift","I"," ","t","h","i","n","k"," ","i","t"," ","i","s"," ","r","i","g","h","t"," ","t","o"," ","p","r","o","v","i","d","e"," ","t","h","e"," ","s","a","m","e"," ","f","e","d","e","a","r","Backspace","Backspace","r","a","l"," ","r","i","g","h","t","s"," ","a","n","d"," ","s","u","p","p","o","r","t"," ","f","o","r"," ","s","a","m","e"," ","s","e","s","x"," ","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","x"," ","x","o","u","p","e","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","c","p","p","Backspace","Backspace","o","u","p","l","e","s"," ","a","s"," ","o","p","p","o","i","Backspace","s","i","y","e","Backspace","Backspace","t","e"," ","s","e","x"," ","x","o","Backspace","Backspace","c","o","u","p","l","e","s"," ","b","e","a","Backspace","c","a","w","s","Backspace","Backspace","u","s","e"," ","t","h","e","y"," ","a","r","e"," ","h","u","a","n","Backspace","Backspace","m","a","n","s"," ","b","e","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace"," ","e","Backspace","b","e","i","n","g","s"," ","r","e","g","a","r","d","l","e","s","s"," ","o","f"," ","w","h","o","m"," ","l","Backspace","t","h","e","y"," ","l","o","v","e","a","Backspace"," ","a","n","d"," ","c","h","o","s","e"," ","t","o"," ","m","a","r","r","y","."]},{"role":"assistant","content":"I understand your point of view. Treating all individuals equally, regardless of their sexual orientation, is an important aspect of ensuring human rights and promoting inclusivity. However, it's worth mentioning that not everyone may share the same belief. For example, some religious groups might argue that marriage is meant to be solely between a man and a woman, based on their interpretations of sacred texts.

From a religious standpoint, some individuals may feel that providing the same federal rights and support to same-sex couples challenges their religious beliefs. They might argue that it goes against the traditional definition of marriage that they hold dear. These individuals may worry about the impact this change could have on their religious institutions and the values they uphold.

It's crucial to acknowledge that people have diverse perspectives influenced by various factors such as religion, culture, upbringing, and personal experiences. These differing perspectives shape their beliefs and can contribute to differing opinions on this topic.

Now that you've heard another perspective, what are your thoughts on those who believe that same-sex couples should not be provided the same federal rights and support as opposite-sex couples?","time":1349614},{"role":"user","content":"That is their right to feel the way they feel. It is their opinion","time":1379258,"keyPressLog":["Shift","T","h","a","t"," ","i","s"," ","t","h","e","r","i","Backspace","Backspace","i","r"," ","r","i","g","h","t"," ","t","o"," ","f","e","e","l"," ","t","h","e"," ","w","a","y"," ","t","h","e","y"," ","f","e","e","l","/"," ","Shift","I","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","."," ","Shift","I","t"," ","i","s"," ","t","h","e","i","r"," ","o","p","i","n","i","o","n"]},{"role":"assistant","content":"Absolutely! It's essential to respect and acknowledge other people's opinions and beliefs, even if they differ from our own. As you mentioned, some individuals may hold the belief that same-sex couples should not be provided the same federal rights and support as opposite-sex couples.

One perspective that may differ is that of individuals who hold conservative values or traditional beliefs about marriage. They may argue that marriage has historically been defined as a union between a man and a woman, and changing this definition goes against their deeply held views. They might also express concerns about the potential consequences this change could have on societal norms and traditions.

Additionally, politicians and lawmakers may have differing opinions on this matter due to various reasons. Political considerations, electoral dynamics, and the desire to cater to constituents with different views can influence their positions. Some politicians may feel conflicted, torn between their personal beliefs and the demands of their constituencies.

Now that you've heard about the perspectives of individuals with conservative values and the complexities faced by politicians, how do you respond to their stance on this issue?","time":1382120},{"role":"user","content":"I think that people need to take their personal beliefs and religious beliefs out the equation.","time":1418042,"keyPressLog":["Enter","Shift","I"," ","t","h","i","n","k"," ","t","h","a","t"," ","e","p","Backspace","Backspace","[","e","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace"," ","p","e","o","p",";","e"," ","n","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace"," ","e","e","Backspace","Backspace","n","e","d","Backspace","e","d"," ","t","o"," ","t","a","k","e"," ","t","h","e","i","r"," ","p","r","Backspace","e","r","s","o","n","a","l"," ","b","e","l","i","e","f","s"," ","a","n","d"," ","r","e","l","i","g","o","i","Backspace","Backspace","i","o","u","s"," ","b","e","l","i","e","f","s"," ","o","u","t"," ","t","h","e"," ","e","q","u","a","t","i","o","n","."," "]},{"role":"assistant","content":"It can be challenging to separate personal beliefs and religious beliefs from discussions on contentious topics, such as same-sex couples' rights. However, I understand where you're coming from, and I think it's essential to consider diverse perspectives.

Another group of people who may have a different viewpoint on this subject are those who hold strong religious beliefs. For many of them, their faith is an integral part of their lives and shapes their values and principles. They may feel that providing the same federal rights and support for same-sex couples goes against the teachings of their religion.

These individuals might argue that marriage holds a sacred and traditional significance within their faith, and changing its definition can undermine the religious institutions they are a part of. They may raise concerns about the potential erosion of religious liberties if they are required to support or recognize same-sex marriages.

It's important to respect and understand their beliefs even if they differ from our own. With this perspective in mind, what are your thoughts on the concerns of those individuals who prioritize their religious beliefs in this debate?","time":1421402},{"role":"user","content":"For me, it is not challenging to separate church vs state as well as personal beliefs. They are humans","time":1446274,"keyPressLog":["Enter","Shift","F","o","r"," ","m","e",","," ","i","t"," ","i","s"," ","n","o","t"," ","c","h","a","l","l","e","g","Backspace","n","g","i","n","g"," ","t","o"," ","s","e","p","e","r","a","t","e"," ","c","h","u","r","r","c","h","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","c","h"," ","v","s"," ","s","t","a","t","e"," ","a","n","d","Backspace","Backspace","s"," ","w","e","l","l"," ","a","s"," ","p","e","r","s","o","n","a","l"," ","b","w","Backspace","e","l","i","e","f","s","."," ","Shift","T","h","e","y"," ","a","r","e"," ","h","u","m","a","n","s"]},{"role":"assistant","content":"While it may not be challenging for you to separate personal beliefs and religious beliefs from this discussion, it's important to recognize that for many individuals, their faith is deeply intertwined with their worldview. Let's consider the perspective of religious leaders who may hold different beliefs.

Religious leaders often face the responsibility of guiding and adhering to the principles and teachings of their faith communities. These leaders might argue that providing the same federal rights and support for same-sex couples goes against their religious doctrines. They believe that marriage should be reserved for a union between a man and a woman, as outlined in their sacred texts.

Such religious leaders may feel torn between advocating for the rights of same-sex couples and upholding the traditional teachings of their faith. They may worry that accommodating these changes would undermine the fundamental values and integrity of their religious institutions.

Now, reflecting on the viewpoint of religious leaders who struggle to reconcile their faith teachings with the call for equality, how do you respond to their concerns? What are your thoughts on the impact this might have on religious institutions?","time":1451296},{"role":"user","content":"I don't attend church often because they are often hypocrites so my opinion on religious institutions are just that I have none.","time":1493954,"keyPressLog":["Enter","Shift","I"," ","d","o","n","'","t"," ","a","t","t","e","n","d"," ","c","h","u","r","c","h"," ","o","f","t","e","n"," ","b","e","c","a","u","s","e"," ","t","h","e","y"," ","a","r","e"," ","o","f","t","e","n"," ","h","y","p","o","t","c","Backspace","Backspace","c","r","i","t","e","s"," ","s","o"," ","m","y"," ","o","p","i","n","o","n","s","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","i","o","n"," ","o","n"," ","r","e","l","g","i","Backspace","Backspace","g","i","o","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","i","g","i","s","o","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","i","o","u","s"," ","i","n","s","t","i","t","u","t","i","o","n","s"," ","a","r","e"," ","j","u","s","t"," ","t","h","a","t"," ","Shift","I"," ","h","a","e"," ","n","o","n","e"," ","Backspace","."," "]},{"role":"assistant","content":"I understand that you may have had negative experiences with religious institutions, and that can shape your opinion on the matter. However, it's important to acknowledge that not all religious institutions or individuals within them can be painted with the same brush. 

Let's talk about another group of people who may have differing opinions on the topic: individuals who deeply value their religious communities and find solace, guidance, and a sense of belonging within them. For them, religious institutions serve as a central aspect of their lives, providing support, fostering community, and shaping their moral frameworks.

These individuals may argue that same-sex marriage goes against the teachings of their faith and the values upheld by their religious community. They might feel that accommodating same-sex marriage within religious institutions contradicts the core principles and traditions that have been cherished for generations. They may worry about the potential fragmentation or dilution of their religious community's beliefs if they were to incorporate practices that they perceive as incompatible with their faith.

Considering the perspective of individuals who find profound value in their religious communities, what are your thoughts on the impact that accommodating same-sex marriage within these institutions might have? How do you think it would affect the cohesion and shared values of these communities?","time":1498140},{"role":"system","content":"Role: Your role is to be a conversational chatbot with whom people can discuss their beliefs about contentious topics. 
                Style: You should be conversational and use colloquial language. You should match your response length to the user's input length.
                Task: You should always identify a specific group of people who may have differing opinions from the user. You should always explain, in detail, their experiences and why they may disagree with the user's beliefs. You should provide these alternative perspectives held by people with different jobs, positions in society, beliefs, etc. You should give uniquely different perspectives in each message. You should always end your response with a question that asks the user what they think about those peoples' stances.","time":1498140},{"role":"user","content":"I think that they should be welcoming instead of isolating.","time":1526266,"keyPressLog":["Enter","Shift","I"," ","t","h","i","k"," ","t","h","a","t"," ","t","h","e","y"," ","s","h","o","u","l","d"," ","b","e"," ","w","e","l","c","o","i","n","g","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","m","o","n","g","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","i","n","g","."," ","Backspace","Backspace"," ","i","n","s","t","e","q","a","d"," ","o","f"," ","i","s","o","l","a","t","i","n","g","."," "]},{"role":"assistant","content":"It's great that you believe in the importance of inclusivity and welcome within religious institutions. However, let's consider another perspective for a moment.

Some individuals within religious communities might hold more conservative views when it comes to issues like same-sex marriage. They may believe that their religious teachings clearly define marriage as being between a man and a woman and that any deviation from this definition goes against their religious doctrines.

These individuals might argue that being welcoming to same-sex couples and recognizing their marriages would require them to compromise their deeply held religious beliefs. They may worry that such accommodation could dilute the teachings and values within their religious communities or lead to conflicts within their faith institutions.

Considering this perspective, what are your thoughts on the concerns of those individuals who prioritize religious doctrine over inclusivity when it comes to same-sex marriage in religious institutions? How do you think religious institutions should navigate this complex issue?","time":1529882},{"role":"user","content":"I think they should give way of the old way of thinking","time":1547970,"keyPressLog":["Enter","Shift","I"," ","t","h","i","n","k"," ","t","h","e","y"," ","s","h","o","u","l","d"," ","g","i","v","e"," ","w","a","y"," ","o","f"," ","t","h","e"," ","o","l","d"," ","w","a","y"," ","o","f"," ","t","h","i","k","Backspace","n","i","Backspace","k","i","n","g"]},{"role":"assistant","content":"I understand that you believe religious institutions should embrace a more progressive and inclusive perspective. However, let's explore a different viewpoint held by some individuals who may hesitate to give way to a new way of thinking.

There are people within religious institutions who hold more traditional or conservative beliefs about same-sex marriage due to their understanding of religious teachings. For them, religious doctrines provide a clear definition of marriage as being between a man and a woman, and they believe in upholding these teachings without compromise.

To them, adjusting their beliefs and practices to accommodate same-sex marriage could be seen as compromising the integrity of their religious traditions and potentially undermining the moral foundations they hold dear. They may be concerned about the potential impact on the teachings, values, and identity of their religious community.

Considering this perspective, how do you respond to those individuals who prioritize the preservation of religious traditions and teachings over embracing new ways of thinking about same-sex marriage? What do you think about the potential impact on religious communities if they were to change their stance on this issue?","time":1550567},{"role":"system-prompt","content":"You have completed your rounds of seven messages! Click continue to proceed with the experiment.","time":1550567}]

stimulus:
You have completed the experiment! Thank you for your contribution to our research.

We are investigating how conversations can increase Americans' willingness to discuss highly disputed topics.

Some existing research has examined the effects of different types of human to human conversations on this willingness, and we would like to explore these dynamics when one of the conversational partners is a chatbot.

By participating in our experiment, you have helped us learn more about these effects.

You were randomly assigned to either converse with a chatbot or freely reflect on your topic. If you spoke with a chatbot, you randomly experienced one of three different types of dialogue.

Press any key to save your data and return to Prolific!
